message.original: 魔力を溜めた後、 広範囲に向けてブレス状の炎を放つ <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６で動作終了間際に追加入力することで 往復攻撃可能</COL>
message.translation: After charging magick, release a breath-like flame in front of you. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Press the button right before the end to repeat the spell.</COL>

message.original: 自身を中心に、一定範囲をカバーする 雷属性の魔法を放つ <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６で攻撃範囲拡大</COL>
message.translation: Emit lightning in a range outwards from you. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Increases the range of the effect.</COL>

message.original: 魔力を溜めた後、闇の霧を発生させる 霧は敵にまとわりつき、継続ダメージを与える <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６で継続時間延長／攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
message.translation: After charging magick, generate a dark fog. The fog will cling to enemies, dealing damage over time. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Increases duration of the effect. Increases the number of hits.</COL>

message.original: 魔力を溜めた後、 敵の足元から巨大な氷の塊を出現させる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６で術始動時に範囲攻撃追加</COL>
message.translation: After charging magick, generate a giant spire of ice at the enemy's feet. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Adds an additional attack at the start of the effect.</COL>

message.original: 魔力を溜めた後、 高い炎の壁を作り出す <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６で攻撃範囲拡大</COL>
message.translation: After charging magick, generate a towering wall of flame. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Increases the range of the effect.</COL>

message.original: 魔力を溜めた後、大杖を振りかざして 雷・斬属性を持つ円月状の衝撃波を放つ <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６で衝撃波が３方向化</COL>
message.translation: After charging magick, brandish your archistaff, releasing a blade-shaped shockwave. Inflicts damage with Lightning and Slash attributes. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Shockwave will fire in 3 directions.</COL>

message.original: 魔力を溜めた後、地を揺らし岩塊を隆起させ、 闇・打属性によるダメージを与える <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６で岩塊数が増加（１→２）</COL>
message.translation: After charging magick, shake the earth, sending eruptions of stone high into the air. Inflicts damage with Darkness and Impact attributes. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Increases number of rocks (1→2).</COL>

message.original: 魔力を溜めた後、 敵の頭上に燃え盛る隕石を落下させる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６で隕石弾数が増加（４→７）</COL>
message.translation: After charging magick, call meteors down from the heavens to land around the enemy. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Increases number of meteors (4→7).</COL>

message.original: 魔力を溜めた後、敵の頭上に落雷を発生させる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６で落雷数が増加（３→５）</COL>
message.translation: After charging magick, smite the enemy from above with tongues of lightning. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Increases number of lightning strikes (3→5).</COL>

message.original: 魔力を溜めた後、上空に濃い闇の霧を発生させる 霧に侵入した全ての敵に継続ダメージを与える <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６で攻撃範囲拡大</COL>
message.translation: After charging magick, conjure a dense dark fog overhead that deals continous damage to enemies within. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Increases the range of the effect.</COL>

message.original: 魔力を溜めた後、氷の槍を発現させ前方に放つ 氷・射属性によるダメージを与える <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６で攻撃範囲拡大</COL>
message.translation: After charging magick, conjure a twisting spike of ice that thrusts forward from the ground. Inflicts damage with Ice and Shot attributes. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Increases the range of the effect.</COL>

message.original: 魔力を溜めて凝縮し、無属性の魔球を発現させる 周囲に魔力を解放し大ダメージを与える 爆発範囲は調節可能で、狭いほど高威力 <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６で爆発範囲の限界幅が拡張</COL>
message.translation: After charging magick, conjure a non-elemental magick orb. The magickal power stored within the orb is released over a wide area, dealing a great deal of damage to foes within it's range. Especially effective in narrow areas. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage of the skill. LV.6: Expands the range of the explosion.</COL>

message.original: 魔力を溜めた後、氷の矢を放つ氷塊を発現させ、 任意のタイミングで矢を高速射出する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６で矢の数が増加／溜め攻撃が可能</COL>
message.translation: After charging magick, conjure a giant snowflake that calls forth and fires arrows of ice at high velocities. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage of the skill. LV.6: Increases number of arrows formed and allows the skill to be charged.</COL>

message.original: 魔力を溜めて雷を引き寄せる魔法杭を発現させ、 自身の杖との間に稲妻を発生させる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にスタミナ消費量の減少 LV.６で攻撃威力上昇／攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
message.translation: Conjure a magickal stake that gathers magickal power from your staff, and calls down lightning when charged. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases stamina cost of skill. LV.6: Increases damage of the skill and number of hits.</COL>

message.original: 【ＥＸ追加効果】 闇の霧の中心部分のダメージ量が増加 <COL ff7878>亜人／鬼人／巨人の敵に与えるダメージ量が増加</COL>
【ＥＸ追加効果】 毒／睡眠の状態異常を付与
